fplR

Summary fixture data for the 2016/17 FPL season

Summary data for all fixtures in the 2016/17 FPL season.

fixtures1617

Format

A tibble with columns

id

unique fixture id

kickoff_time_formatted

kick-off time

event_day

day of event/round of fixtures

stats

list of in-game events

team_h_difficulty

difficulty rating of home team (1 to 5, 5 being the most difficult)

team_a_difficulty

difficulty rating of away team (1 to 5, 5 being the most difficult)

code

FPL fixture code

kickoff_time

kick-off time

team_h_score

No. times the home team scored

team_a_score

No. times the away team scored

finished

Logical indicating if fixture is finished

minutes

No. minutes of fixture played

event

Season round no.

team_a

Name of away team

team_h

Name of home team

Source

https://fantasy.premierleague.com/drf/fixtures/, downloaded 2017-06-07

Examples

data(fixtures1617)
